channel.title: Oscar Yinn on oscaryinn
channel.description: Recent content in Oscar Yinn on oscaryinn

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Junjie Oscar Yin I conduct research in natural language processing and machine learning. Currently, I am fortunate to be collaborating with Sasha Rush. In my undergraduate years at Johns Hopkins, I am grateful to be advised by Alan Yuille and supported by the Westgate Scholarship. During my studies, I spent a year at University of Oxford, where I had the privilege of being mentored by Michael Wooldridge.
